changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE TerraWorkspaceSink ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, -- primary key workspace TEXT NOT NULL, -- the fully-qualified 'Namespace/Name' of the Terra workspace to execute workflows in entity_type TEXT NOT NULL, -- the entity type to import data from the source as from_outputs TEXT NOT NULL, -- mapping of how to coerce the output of executor to whatever the sink understands in serialized EDN details TEXT NOT NULL, -- the identifier of the sink details table identifier TEXT NOT NULL, -- the name of the output uniquely identifying the entity CONSTRAINT TERRAWORKSPACESINK_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (id) )
